attributes.action: bring to trial at a court of law the senior bankers who have caused the banking crisis
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Senior Executives, Chairmen and Directors of banks who have caused the banking crisis leading to the depression should be brought to trial at the Old Bailey

rejection.details: This is a matter for the police.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
